name: Block Up 4k
description:
Launch the colorful blocks up, merge same tiles together and blast to connect 3 and more! Try to reach the highest score in this challenging puzzle game.

The higher the number of the tiles, the better score you get! Can you reach the highest level with high score among your friends?

- Rotate number blocks and merge tiles to double
- Match 3 tiles and blast blocks to empty space.
- Level up and earn coins
- Reach high score before the board is full.

Only few can make millions of points! Are you ready for endless fun?
publishers: ALICTUS YAZILIM EGITIM BILISIM TEKNOLOJILERI ELEKTRONIK SANAYI VE TICARET
